title: Staked
description: Linda Holiday has been hunting vampires since the day her family was murdered by Chicago's must illusive vampire, Stoney. She has dedicated her entire life to ridding the city of the dangerous blood-suckers, with Stoney's name at the top of her list. But when her comrades are abducted during an impetuous scouting mission, Lina's world is turned upside down. With the revelation that vampires are not the only creatures stalking the streets at night, Lina must put aside her revenge and strike a deal with Stoney. Can Lina sacrifice herself, her beliefs, and most importantly, her revenge, in order to rescue her allies from a fate worse than death?
author: Chelsea Lynn Charters
